adventiumobject

sense.t[51]

Superclass
Tree

Property
Summary

Method
Summary

Property
Details

Method
Details

Adventium is the basic stuff of the game universe. This is the default material for any object that doesn’t specify a different material. This type of material is opaque to all senses.

adventium :   Material
